feed.title: Workshop on Differentiable Parallel Programming
feed.subtitle: Workshop on Differentiable Parallel Programming at the ACM SIGPLAN Symposium on Principles and Practice of Parallel Programming 2024.

entry.title: The Workshop Website is live!
entry.content:
The workshop website if finally live! The call for proposals is due to be posted soon with all involved submission instructions, and our invited speakers are also due to be announced soon!

Looking forward to seeing many of you in Edinburg in March!
entry.summary: The workshop website if finally live! The call for proposals is due to be posted soon with all involved submission instructions, and our invited speakers are also due to be announced soon!
